TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {3627=In this document, the Federal Communications Commission (Commission) announces that the Office of Management and Budget (OMB) has approved, for a period of three years, the information collection requirements associated with the Commission's Report and Order, WT Docket No. 12-40, RM 11510, FCC 14-181. This document is consistent with the Report and Order, which stated that the Commission would publish a document in the Federal Register announcing OMB approval and the effective date of the requirements., 11915=Title 47 published on 2014-10-01}

textAfterTable: FEDERAL COMMUNICATIONS COMMISSION Final rule; announcement of effective date. 47 CFR 22.165(e), 22.948, and 22.953, published at 79 FR 72143, December 5, 2014, are effective on May 19, 2015. 47 CFR Part 22 Summary In this document, the Federal Communications Commission (Commission) announces that the Office of Management and Budget (OMB) has approved, for a period of three years, the information collection requirements associated with the Commission's Report and Order, WT Docket No. 12-40, RM 11510, FCC 14-181. This document is consistent with the Report and Order, which stated that the Commission would publish a document in the Federal Register announcing OMB approval and the effective date of the requirements. 2014-12-05; vol. 79 # 234 - Friday, December 5, 2014 79 FR 72143 - Cellular Service, Including Changes in Licensing of Unserved Area GPO FDSys XML | Text Additional Documents
